reasoning_log: The matching process relied heavily on identifying specific room types and key differentiating features mentioned in the tags. Bathrooms were distinguished by the presence of a window and a washlet (Desc_7/Image_7) versus a compact, windowless design (Desc_4/Image_4). Living spaces were differentiated based on their relationship to the balcony and overall layout: Image_2 showed a square room dominated by a large balcony window (Desc_2), while Image_1 showed a longer space leading to a balcony, suitable for combined living/dining (Desc_1). Bedrooms were separated by window size and resulting natural light levels (Desc_5/Image_5 vs. Desc_6/Image_6). Image_8 was uniquely identified as the public facility (Desc_8). Image_3, a long interior space leading away from the entrance, was assigned to the hallway/entrance description (Desc_3). All 8 descriptions were matched 1:1 to the 8 images.

matching_result_list.evidence: Long, open space leading to a large sliding door/balcony, suitable for combined living/dining ('規劃彈性', '陽台相連').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光佳(大片落地窗引入自然光), 通風良好(陽台推拉門可全開), 規劃彈性(長方形格局好劃分客廳餐廳), 地板易清潔(耐磨木紋地板), 層高尚可(裸露管線但不壓迫), 陽台相連(適合晾衣或放戶外機), 牆面留白(方便日後收納與家具配置)

matching_result_list.evidence: Square room layout dominated by a large sliding glass door leading directly to a balcony railing, matching '客廳臨陽台' and '大面窗景'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 大面窗景(落地窗看向社區景觀), 採光充足(窗面寬度大), 動靜分區潛力(客廳與臥房門相鄰好動線), 插座預留(牆面多插座方便家電配置), 空間方正(家具好擺放), 隔音待確認(大面窗臨外側可能有噪音風險)

matching_result_list.evidence: Long, straight, empty space leading into the interior of the apartment, characteristic of a main hallway/entrance ('動線筆直').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 玄關獨立(大門與客廳有過道較有隱私), 動線筆直(玄關直通客廳視線明確), 家具配置受限(空間較窄長型沙發與餐桌需精算尺寸), 裝潢新穎(地板門片皆為新成屋狀態), 可規劃收納櫃(玄關與側牆適合設計鞋櫃與收納櫃)

matching_result_list.evidence: Compact bathroom with dry/wet separation, beige tiles, and crucially, no visible window, matching '通風照明欠佳' and '空間偏緊湊'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 乾濕分離(獨立淋浴間玻璃拉門), 通風照明欠佳(未見窗戶可能需仰賴排風), 衛浴設備齊全(洗手台馬桶毛巾架皆備), 清潔相對容易(大面磁磚牆地), 空間偏緊湊(轉身與置物空間有限)

matching_result_list.evidence: Features a large window providing excellent natural light and a city view, fitting the '採光良好' tag expected for a master bedroom.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光良好(大窗面外看社區景觀), 通風佳(開窗面積充足), 空間方正(床與衣櫃易配置), 地板安靜舒適(木紋地板腳感佳), 預留收納空間(整面牆可做衣櫃或書桌), 私密性尚可(窗外為住宅群相對安靜)

matching_result_list.evidence: Small, high, dark window results in poor natural light, directly matching '採光一般' and '室內燈光需求較高'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光一般(窗戶較小光線較柔和), 通風尚可(有對外窗可開啟), 適合作書房或客房(坪數較小), 方正好利用(可放單人床+小衣櫃), 室內燈光需求較高(自然光不足需仰賴照明)

matching_result_list.evidence: Spacious bathroom with grey tiles, dry/wet separation, a visible window, and a toilet equipped with a washlet attachment ('有免治馬桶設備').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光與通風佳(有對外大窗), 乾濕分離(獨立淋浴間玻璃門), 衛浴設備新穎(面盆馬桶與五金看起來新), 空間寬敞(淋浴與如廁區域距離舒適), 易打理(淺色大尺寸磁磚), 有免治馬桶設備(提升舒適度與機能)

matching_result_list.evidence: Clearly shows gym equipment (treadmills) and a separate seating area, matching '公設健身房/交誼空間'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 社區公設豐富(配置跑步機與重訓設備), 採光佳(大面窗引入自然光), 運動方便(住戶可在社區內運動省去外出), 交誼空間(一側有桌椅可小聚會), 安全性較高(室內運動對家庭與長輩友善), 維護狀況佳(地毯與設備看起來新穎)
